definitions.zhao1: (chess) move; trick; all right!; (dialect) to add;
definitions.zhao2: to touch; to come in contact with; to feel; to be affected by; to catch fire; to burn; (coll.) to fall asleep; (after a verb) hitting the mark; succeeding in;
definitions.zhe5: aspect particle indicating action in progress;
definitions.zhuo2: to wear (clothes); to contact; to use; to apply;
